title: Ozone Platform Wayland
body:
**Describe the bug**
I'm using the ozone platform wayland flag as in the description. If I start the application, the screen stays white, even though the webview is starting (I see it based on the title).

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Use this config
```
{
	"optInTeamsV2": true,
	"followSystemTheme": true,
	"awayOnSystemIdle": true,
	"electronCLIFlags": [
		["ozone-platform","wayland"]
	]
}
```
2. Start app

**Expected behavior**
Screen stays white 

**Screenshots**
![image](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/8597645/7088a806-9541-4033-b56f-17d6f08231cc)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Kubuntu 23.10
 - Installation package deb
 - Version 1.4.27
